oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Common cereal viruses
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cereals
Plant viruses
Hosts
Vectors
Plant diseases
Viroses
Barley yellow dwarf virus
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A summary of the general characteristics of viruses is followed by sections on six common cereal viruses: Barley Yellow Dwarf Virus (BYDV), Soilborne Wheat Mosaic Virus (SBWMV), Wheat Streak Mosaic Virus (WSMV), Brome Mosaic Virus (BMV), Barley Yellow Mosaic Virus (BYMV), and Barley Stripe Mosaic Virus (BSMV). For each virus, a description of plant symptoms is given, accompanied by short sections on the appearance of the virus, its vectors, hosts, distribution, and importance
